# Columbus Concrete & Design Co
> Professional concrete contractors serving Columbus, OH and Franklin County

## About Us
Columbus Concrete & Design Co is a professional concrete contracting company serving Columbus, Ohio and surrounding areas including Dublin, Westerville, Grove City, Hilliard, Reynoldsburg, Gahanna, Upper Arlington, and all of Franklin County.

## Contact Information
- Phone: (614) 902-3793
- Location: Columbus, OH 43215
- Website: https://columbusconcretecontractor.co
- Hours: Mon-Fri 7AM-6PM, Sat 8AM-4PM

## Services Offered
- Concrete Driveways: New installation, replacement, and repairs
- Concrete Patios: Custom design and installation for outdoor living spaces
- Concrete Slabs: Garage floors, shed foundations, workshop bases
- Stamped Concrete: Decorative patterns mimicking stone, brick, or tile
- Concrete Foundations: Residential and commercial foundation work
- Concrete Walkways: Sidewalks and garden paths

## Service Areas
Columbus, Dublin, Westerville, Grove City, Hilliard, Reynoldsburg, Gahanna, Upper Arlington, Worthington, Powell, Pickerington, Canal Winchester, Delaware, New Albany, Lewis Center, Blacklick, and surrounding Franklin County communities.

## Key Features
- Licensed and fully insured
- Free, no-obligation estimates
- Quality materials rated for Ohio climate
- Competitive transparent pricing
- Professional experienced team
- On-time project completion

## Typical Pricing (Estimates)
- Concrete driveways: $8-15 per square foot
- Standard 600 sq ft driveway: $4,800-$9,000
- Stamped/decorative concrete: Additional cost
- Contact for accurate project estimate

## FAQ
Q: How long does concrete take to cure?
A: Initial set in 24-48 hours, full cure in 28 days. Stay off new concrete for 7 days, avoid heavy vehicles for 2 weeks.

Q: Do you offer free estimates?
A: Yes, we provide free, no-obligation estimates with detailed written quotes.

Q: What areas do you serve?
A: Columbus, OH and greater Franklin County including Dublin, Westerville, Grove City, Hilliard, and surrounding communities.
